#summary This page has some words about the SQLite driver.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This is the driver for SQLite support.

= Details =

Module path: *dbmigrations.drivers.sqlite*
Main class: *dbmigrations.drivers.SQLite*

Class tree:

  * SQLiteDriver(dbmigrations.drivers.GenericDriver)

= Dependences =

This module depends of *pySQLite* library, the most popular driver for SQLite on Python language. You can see more about *(and download it)* on its official website: [1]

The introspection does through the PRAGMA statements suplied by SQLite protocol (described in [2]).

[1] [http://www.initd.org/tracker/pysqlite/wiki/pysqlite]
[2] [http://www.sqlite.org/pragma.html#schema]
